entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Synchronize Blazor WASM and Blazor Hybrid Perf Testing #42862
  • Incorrect URL decoding, %3A character is mistakenly removed #42859
  • builder.RootComponents.Add<App>("#app"); #42855
  • [Question] When _transformCache(HashSet<ClaimsPrincipal>) in AuthenticationService will really help ? #42852
  • What will happen if C# p/invokes a C++ WASM module that starts a WebWorker and then calls back to C# callback? #42851
  • Explicitly Enumerate the Subset of C# Blazor WASM Supports #42850
  • Not possible to handle/log serialization errors when returning IQueryable from an endpoint #42849

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Allow configuring virtualization spacer element type #42449
    7.0-preview7
  • BackgroundService channel reader never gets data #42858
  • Blazor , RenderFragment to Raw Html string #42854
  • .net 6.0.302 AddRazorRuntimeCompilation breaks global usings in MVC app #42839
  • aspnetcore Abnormal prompt during operation #42647
  • [Trimming] Identity #41703
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Description to OpenApiResponse in OpenApiGenerator.cs #42866
  • Updating _AddContentRootForProjectReferences target #42863
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding a new Http3Cat project to ease testing #42861
  • Fix up project search scenarios when no option is provided #42860
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Suppress downgrade error in SharedFx bundle #42857
    area-infrastructure
  • Add logging to QUIC tests and disable parallel execution #42853
    area-runtime
  • Bump terser from 5.14.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/Components/CustomElements/src/js #42847
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • IdentityUI: Accessability Fix focus contrast #42840
    area-identity, 7.0-rc1
  • Fixed variable name typo in DisposableObjectPool #42843
    community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump terser from 5.14.0 to 5.14.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #42844
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump terser from 5.13.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #42845
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump terser from 5.13.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #42841
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump terser from 5.13.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #42842
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Update templates to incorporate net7 changes #42802
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow Collection Default Value binding #42824
    area-web-frameworks
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Mark SignalR SourceGen as not shipping for RC and RTM #42720
    area-signalr
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
